thought: To craft a diamond shovel, I need to craft a stick first. I have 1 dark oak plank at slot 30, and I need to place it in the crafting table in order to craft 4 sticks. I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1
